messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] vida buena
messages.messageBody:
<<I've heard the 2005 conference will be in Toronto. ;)

Kathryn >>

Okay .. who knew I was toying with that in the dark recesses of my mind?! But I just can't fathom that you all would want to travel up here!

Pam L


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] vida buena
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/18/2004 11:02:14 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... All right, you keep moving further and further north.  Pretty soon you ll be in Canada...so
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/18/2004 11:02:14 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
> We're considering a move to upstate NY (lower Columbia County).

All right, you keep moving further and further north. Pretty soon you'll be
in Canada...so look out y'all...here she comes.
Pam G<<<<<<

LOL

It's freaking Cameron out! We went from Asheville, NC to Murphy, NC, to
Wilkesboro, NC, back to Asheville, then to Floyd, VA--and now Upstate, NY.
Cameron's hating that we keep getting further and futher away.

Floyd seems the best of all worlds to us, but the opportunities in NY
....well, they're unique. Ben's there next weekend to scope things out deeply. Floyd
is special----and even if we don't move there, it'll be our "vacation" spot.
New York just has some GREAT possibilities!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re:Re: vida buena
messages.messageBody:
Kathryn writes:
>I've heard the 2005 conference will be in Toronto. ;)
<
<
Oh! I hope so! I'
I'm dying to go but can't for the life of me figure out a way to afford it this year. Toronto though...that's possible. That's doable. Oh boy, I'm starting up a piggy bank today.
Dawn (in NS)



Come to the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference August 27-29 in Peabody, MA!
For more information, go to www.LiveandLearnConference.org

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] vida buena
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/18/2004 5:27:45 PM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Amy- we live near Albany, NY but are seriously
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/18/2004 5:27:45 PM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
Amy- we live near Albany, NY but are seriously considering moving up to the
Adirondack/Plattsburgh area (we have family there) for many of the same
reasons. We are worried about the logistics of jobs/retirement savings, etc.
The
growing season is so short there too that I wonder how much of a garden we
can
produce?
I'm wondering how your family is doing with the changes.
Amanda<<<<<


We're considering a move to upstate NY (lower Columbia County). And I'm
cracking up that you would be worried about the short growing season in
Plattsburgh. I'm coming from South Carolina, where our growing season is early April to
November!!!!!!!! LOL! June to September is hard for me to swallow! <g>

~Kelly
